Rete principale: 158.110.0.0

Subnet mask: 255.255.192.0

Indirizzi da analizzare:

A = 158.110.191.3

B = 158.110.192.3

Quante subnet:
192 = 11000000 => 2 Bit per il subnetting:

Incremento:
256 - 192 = 64

subnet  range 				broadcast
1	158.110.0.0–158.110.63.255 	158.110.63.255
2	158.110.64.0–158.110.127.255 	158.110.127.255
3	158.110.128.0–158.110.191.255 	158.110.191.255
4	158.110.192.0–158.110.255.255 	158.110.255.255

158.110.191.3 → sottorete 158.110.128.0/18

158.110.192.3 → sottorete 158.110.192.0/18
